name: New net inc
description: Managed projects, developed project plans, and supervised project teams. Led the development of key systems, including a multi-tenant sales management system for Saudi Telecom Company (STC) and a legal case management system (Qanone). Worked on Odoo ERP using Python for system customization. Focused on client communication, system design, and ensuring timely project delivery with integration of APIs, AWS services, and various web technologies like PHP, Laravel, Yii2, Vue.js, MySQL, and RESTful Web Services.
